## Codebase Overview

Based on my exploration, this is a **Next.js portfolio project** with the following characteristics:

### Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 15.3.3 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 4
- **UI Components**: Radix UI primitives
- **Animation**: Framer Motion
- **Content**: MDX for blog/content
- **Testing**: Vitest with React Testing Library
- **Linting**: ESLint with Next.js config

### Project Structure
```
/src
├── app/          - Next.js App Router pages
├── components/   - React components (likely UI primitives)
├── lib/          - Utility functions and shared logic
├── content/      - MDX content files
├── hooks/        - Custom React hooks
├── types/        - TypeScript type definitions
└── styles/       - CSS/styling files
```

### Key Dependencies
- MDX ecosystem (next-mdx-remote, gray-matter)
- Terminal/CLI UI (ink, react-ink-commander)
- State management likely via React hooks
- Animation via Framer Motion

### Development Practices
- Comprehensive testing setup (Vitest)
- Type-safe with TypeScript strict mode
- Component-based architecture with Radix UI
- Content-driven with MDX support

This appears to be a developer portfolio with a CLI-style interface component (based on the ink dependencies) and blog/content capabilities.

### Critical Files for Implementation
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/package.json` - Core dependencies and scripts
